scripts.build: wp-scripts build src/events-manager.js src/admin.js src/index.js src/frontend.js src/booking.js
scripts.start: wp-scripts start src/events-manager.js src/admin.js src/index.js src/frontend.js src/booking.js
scripts.dev: wp-scripts start --no-watch src/events-manager.js src/admin.js src/index.js src/frontend.js src/booking.js
